author: philip
msg: Nested Locations (which are not used very often and only make sense
inside SVNParentPath) have inherited the parent's root_dir since the
code was written in r862059.  I can see no sense in using the
parent's value and the few features that that rely on root_dir don't
appear to work when the nested Locations are used.
This change fixes v2 POST and write-through mirroring when nested
Also, a nested Location inside an SVNPath Location is ambiguous so
prevent access and log the problem.
(merge_dir_config): Prefer the child root_dir, detect/log invalid
nesting, prevent access to invalid nesting repositories.
